articles.author: LOLITA C. BALDOR
articles.title: Army releases name of 3rd soldier who died in helicopter and airliner crash near DC airport - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Army has released the name of the third soldier who died Wednesday when an Army helicopter collided with an American Airlines jet near the D.C. airport. Cpt. Rebecca M. Lobach, of Durham, N.C., served as an Army aviation officer since July 2019. Her award…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The Army on Saturday released the name of the third soldier who died Wednesday when an Army helicopter collided with an American Airlines jet near Reagan National Airport in D.C.
